Font Options
[Build Options]


Defines

#define APDK_CGTIMES
 Include support for CGTimes font - see Device Fonts.

#define APDK_COURIER
 Include support for Courier font - see Device Fonts.

#define APDK_LTRGOTHIC
 Include support for Letter Gothic font - see Device Fonts.

#define APDK_UNIVERS
 Include support for Universe font - see Device Fonts.

Detailed Description

Define one or more of the font directive to enable device fonts. These need to be defined to support hardware fonts in the printer. Enabling fonts is NOT recommended, however if ASCII text needs to be sent to the printer then define the font(s) needed. Only define the fonts that will be used, each font that is enabled will make the code size larger. See Device Fonts for more information about fonts or PrintContext::RealizeFont() to create a font.
Generated at Tue Jan 8 15:33:01 2013 for APDK Developer's Guide. All types of support by HP for APDK software are discontinued.
